A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Baffled by the critic reviews. 

Plot was terrible\, killed off any interesting plot points and introduced nothing\, killed off the villain with no payoff\, logically inconsistent\, poor comedic delivery from many actors (except Finn).  Killed one of the all time greatest characters - on an Island\, alone\, for no apparent reason. What an absolute tragedy of cinema for Like Skywalker to be given that send off.

The fact the Adam Driver is a great actor is the sole positive in the movie.
